page_content:
Non-statistical indicator

We have identified the following to be relevant to this indicator - Rights of Women: Equality

.

fr.page_content:
Indicateur non statistique

Nous avons identifié les éléments suivants comme étant pertinents pour cet indicateur - Droits des femmes: Égalité

.

SDG_GOAL: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET: Target 5.a: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 5.a.2: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
STAT_CONC_DEF: Indicator 5.a.2 looks at the extent to which the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 5.a: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 5.a.2: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
